001package imagingbook.lib.filter.examples;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterScalar;
004import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
005
006public class ExampleFilterScalar extends GenericFilterScalar //implements ReportsProgress
007{
008        
009        static float[][] H = {
010                        {1, 2, 1},
011                        {2, 4, 2},
012                        {1, 2, 1}};
013        
014        int width = 3;
015        int height = 3;
016        int xc = 1;
017        int yc = 1;
018        
019        @Override
020        protected float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v) {
021                float sum = 0;
022                for (int j = 0; j < height; j++) {
023                        int vj = v + j - yc;
024                        for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {
025                                int ui = u + i - xc;
026                                sum = sum + plane.getVal(ui, vj) * H[i][j];
027                        }
028                }
029                return sum / 16;
030        }
031
032}
